duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish and nurture positive relationships with vendors, fostering effective communication and timely payment resolution.
Verify the accuracy of invoices, purchase orders, and payment requests. Accurately input and code invoices into the accounting system for processing.
Perform thorough reconciliation of vendor statements against accounts payable records to ensure accuracy and resolve discrepancies.
Maintain organized and detailed records of all accounts payable transactions and related documents. Ensure compliance with document retention policies and financial regulations.
Continuously evaluate accounts payable processes and identify opportunities for efficiency enhancements. Propose and implement process improvements to streamline workflows and reduce errors.

Gather and consolidate various operational overhead accounts, such as utilities, vehicle payments, and general operating expenses. Implement strategies to centralize and streamline the processing of operational overhead accounts.
Analyze operational expenses to identify trends and areas for cost-saving opportunities. Collaborate with the finance team to provide insights on expense management.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent; Associate's degree or relevant certification preferred.
